ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past three months, how often did you try to stop your partner's drinking by getting angry?
In the past three months, how often did you have arguments about your partner's drinking while he/she was drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you show how unhappy you were when your partner was drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you try to scare your partner from drinking by giving warnings?
In the past three months, how often did you tell your partner the things that he/she did when he/she was drunk?
In the past three months, how often did you spend more time with your partner when he/she was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you do things your partner likes when he/she was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you give your partner compliments when he/she was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you enjoy your partner's company when he/she was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you do special things for your partner when he/she was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you support your partner when he/she was having trouble staying sober?
In the past three months, how often did you arrange non-drinking social outings with your partner?
In the past three months, how often did you enjoy each other when your partner was not drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you bring alcoholic beverages home?
In the past three months, how often did you do things your partner likes when he/she was drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you support your partner to have ''just two or three'' drinks?
In the past three months, how often did you refuse to be home with your partner when he/she was drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you keep out of your partner's way when he/she was drunk?
In the past three months, how often did you go out alone when your partner was drinking?
In the past three months, how often did you refuse to take care of your partner when he/she was drunk?
Significant-Other Behavior Questionnaire - Sum of the Punish Drinking (PD) Subscale
Notes: Sum of sobq1, sobq2, sobq3, sobq4, sobq5

ElementDescription: Significant-Other Behavior Questionnaire - Sum of the Support Sobriety (SS) Subscale
Notes: Sum of sobq6, sobq7, sobq8, sobq9, sobq10, sobq11, sobq12, sobq13

ElementDescription: Significant-Other Behavior Questionnaire - Sum of the Support Drinking (SD) Subscale
Significant-Other Behavior Questionnaire - Sum of the Withdraw from Patient (WFP) Subscale
Notes: Sum of sobq17, sobq18, sobq19, sobq20

ElementDescription: Significant-Other Behavior Questionnaire - Sum of all items
Respondent details
Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime
